svg.text: Exchange auth code for user info
Generate initial Llama Stack token (empty scopes)
Display chat with history + token status
Check token expiry and required scopes
Prepare MCP headers with validated token
Call list_files tool with JWT token
No local token validation - passthrough mode
Forward request to underlying service with token
Validate token against its own auth system
Show "ğŸ” Authorization required" with approve button
âš ï¸ This will grant file access
Generate new MCP token with additional scopes
Retry tool call with upgraded token
Show "ğŸ“‹ Approval requested - waiting for admin"
Call k8s_get_pods tool with JWT token
No local token validation - passthrough mode
Tool execution failed: service auth error
Show approval popup for k8s:admin scope
Click "âœ… Approve K8s Admin Access" in popup
Show "ğŸ“‹ Admin approval required for K8s access"
Generate new MCP token with k8s:admin scope
Check if user's token has been updated
Retry failed requests with new token
Success: pod list with admin permissions
Fetch available tools via MCP protocol
